statements: UPDATE past_concerts SET attendance = 500, reviews = 'Great concert with energetic performance' WHERE concert_id = 1;
UPDATE past_concerts SET setlist = 'Song1, Song2, Song3', concert_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE concert_id = 2;
UPDATE past_concerts SET setlist = 'New Setlist', attendance = 500 WHERE concert_id = 123
UPDATE past_concerts SET reviews = 'Great show! Highly recommended.' WHERE concert_id = 456
UPDATE concert_setlist SET setlist = 'New Songs' WHERE concert_id = 1;
UPDATE concert_details SET review = 'Great concert!' WHERE attendance > 1000;
UPDATE concert_setlist SET setlist = 'New Setlist' WHERE concert_id = 1;
UPDATE concert_details SET attendance = 500, review = 'Great concert!' WHERE concert_id = 2;
UPDATE Setlist SET song_order = 1 WHERE concert_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Attendance SET attendance_status = 'Present' WHERE attendee_name = 'John Doe' AND concert_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE Setlist SET song_name = 'New Song', song_order = 5 WHERE concert_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Review SET review_text = 'Amazing performance!', rating = 5 WHERE review_id = '456e7890-e12a-34b5-c678-901345612345';
UPDATE setlists SET songs = ARRAY['Song A', 'Song B', 'Song C'] WHERE setlist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE attendance SET total_attendees = 500, concert_date = '2022-07-15 20:00:00' WHERE attendance_id = 'a1b2c3d4-1234-5678-9876-abcdef123456';
UPDATE setlists SET songs = ARRAY['Song A', 'Song B'] WHERE setlist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE attendance SET total_attendees = 500, concert_date = '2022-10-01 19:30:00' WHERE attendance_id = '987e6543-b21d-43a5-7654-78e901287654';
UPDATE Concerts SET ticket_price = 50.00 WHERE concert_date = '2022-12-01';
UPDATE Attendance SET ticket_type = 'VIP' WHERE attendee_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE Concerts SET ticket_price = 50.75 WHERE artist_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE Setlists SET song_duration = '00:04:30' WHERE song_title = 'Song ABC';
